description:
Glen was the head of the Baskerville family 100 years ago. Glen might never been a human but a "spirit" that is the Baskerville`s head and must continue for eternity thus the necessity of having new bodies through the five chains with black feathers. He reveals to Jack, that his transfer is similar to reincarnation, the he transfer his spirit to another body but he loses his current personality. Glen`s next body was supposed to be Gilbert with Raven as the chosen Chain.He is the main antagonist of the story.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Glen Baskerville
